member.name: T:Galaga.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: M:Galaga.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().

member.name: M:Galaga.App.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used such as when the application is launched to open a specific file.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:Galaga.App.OnNavigationFailed(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when Navigation to a certain page fails

member.name: M:Galaga.App.OnSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended. Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.
member.param: The source of the suspend request.

member.name: M:Galaga.Command.RelayCommand.#ctor(System.Action,System.Func{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Galaga.Command.RelayCommand.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method that determines whether the command can execute in its current state.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.
member.returns: true if this command can be executed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Galaga.Command.RelayCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method to be called when the command is invoked.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.

member.name: E:Galaga.Command.RelayCommand.CanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Occurs when changes occur that affect whether or not the command should execute.

member.name: T:Galaga.Model.GameObject
member.summary: Represents a game object in the Galaga game.

member.name: P:Galaga.Model.GameObject.X
member.summary: Gets or sets the x location of the game object.

member.name: P:Galaga.Model.GameObject.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets the y location of the game object.

member.name: P:Galaga.Model.GameObject.SpeedX
member.summary: Gets the x speed of the game object.

member.name: P:Galaga.Model.GameObject.SpeedY
member.summary: Gets the y speed of the game object.

member.name: P:Galaga.Model.GameObject.Width
member.summary: Gets the width of the game object.

member.name: P:Galaga.Model.GameObject.Height
member.summary: Gets the height of the game object.

member.name: P:Galaga.Model.GameObject.Sprite
member.summary: Gets or sets the sprite associated with the game object.

member.name: M:Galaga.Model.GameObject.MoveRight
member.summary: Moves the game object right. Precondition: None Postcondition: X == X@prev + SpeedX

member.name: M:Galaga.Model.GameObject.MoveLeft
member.summary: Moves the game object left. Precondition: None Postcondition: X == X@prev + SpeedX

member.name: M:Galaga.Model.GameObject.MoveUp
member.summary: Moves the game object up. Precondition: None Postcondition: Y == Y@prev - SpeedY

member.name: M:Galaga.Model.GameObject.MoveDown
member.summary: Moves the game object down. Precondition: None Postcondition: Y == Y@prev + SpeedY

member.name: M:Galaga.Model.GameObject.SetSpeed(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the speed of the game object. Precondition: speedX >= 0 AND speedY >=0 Postcondition: SpeedX == speedX AND SpeedY == speedY

member.name: M:Galaga.Model.GameObject.Intersects(Galaga.Model.GameObject)
member.summary:
Checks if the game object intersects with another game object.
the game object to check for intersection with. true if the game objects intersect false if the game objects don't intersect
